download.title: Download InsightFlow
download.description: Download InsightFlow AI Trading application for mobile, desktop and install as a PWA
download.subtitle: Access your trading insights anywhere with our native apps and offline support
download.androidDescription: Get our native Android app for the best mobile experience with push notifications and offline support
download.desktopDescription: Download our macOS desktop app for a full-featured trading experience on your laptop or desktop
download.pwaDescription: Install InsightFlow as a Progressive Web App directly from your browser
download.pwaInstructions: Scan this QR code with your mobile device or click the button below to install
download.scanQRCode: Scan this QR code with your device's camera
download.pwaRequirements: Works on any modern browser (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge)
download.offlineSupport: Supports offline functionality and automatic sync
download.feature1: Full offline support with automatic sync when you're back online
download.feature2: Push notifications for alerts, market events, and trade signals
download.feature3: Faster performance and optimized UI for your device
download.feature4: Secure local storage for sensitive trading data
download.alreadyInstalled: You're already using the installed app!
